title: The Lodestar
description: For Christie Heron, ruthless ambition is the lodestar of his destiny. Determined to break free from his humble origins in the border country of Northumbria, he enlists in the household of Richard of Gloucester, rising with his lord to the dangerous pinnacles of power.Tangled in Richard's web of treason and tragedy, Christie learns the full price that his destiny demands, Meg his beloved sister and only friend, rejects him. Julian, daughter of a knight of Oxfordshire, bears him undying enmity.And the long shadow of the Welsh adventurer Henry Tudor falls dark over Bosworth Field....
author: Pamela Belle
